title: Why is it that when you push a tower right BEHIND  minion
body:
The tower still hits you?

Pleaase, either fix it or fire the guy who coded that, it's the most annoying shit ever

replies.body: Usually ties to hit box, better to wait the extra .2 seconds and let the tower register the shot on the minion before entering. You will see the line heading to the minion when this happens
